description:
** Top Rating Reproductive Health App ** 
 
Check out the most widely-used period, ovulation & pregnancy tracker, which has been helping to improve the well-being of over 300,000,000 women across 45+ countries in the past decade. 
 
We understand your concerns about your private data security, especially with the recent news.
Here's how we protect your data:
• You can use our app without creating an account.
• You remain COMPLETELY ANONYMOUS while using our app.
• You can DELETE ALL DATA in 1 click whenever you want.
 
At every stage of your life, we safeguard your well-being. 
 
PERIOD & CYCLE CALENDAR
We'll remind you of the dates when your next period starts and ends on time. It's useful whether you have irregular or regular menses. Better? You'll receive tailored PMS advice and instant menstrual pain relief guidance.
 
OVULATION & FERTILITY TRACKER
We help you calculate your most fertile days and analyze your fertility window based on your unique cycle. You can get pregnant naturally ASAP by learning your CHANCE OF CONCEPTION every day.
 
PREGNANCY MODE: WEEK-BY-WEEK 
Follow your baby's weekly growth. Use our due date calculator to find out when your baby's BIG DAY will be and count down it.
 
BIRTH CONTROL PLANNER
Quickly record and stay on track with your contraceptive methods like pills, rings, patches, injections, IUDs, or implants. You can customize the reminder message for individual services.
 
PILL REMINDER
Set start date, interval, durations, and dose quantity for any medication, drugs, or supplements. So you won't forget to take pills when life gets busy.
 
SYMPTOM PREDICTIONS & TIPS
Record your symptoms during any life stage. Get predictions and courses to learn how to deal with them. Take breast self-exam monthly to find abnormalities early.
 
>>Key Features:
- Accurate prediction & reminders of menstruation & the most fertile days 
- Track the cycle lengths, flow intensity, when you are ovulating, birth control methods, etc.
- Log 58 symptoms, 67 moods, and energy levels to know your menstrual pattern
- Track daily chance of getting pregnant with BBT, cervical mucus, ovulation & pregnancy test records
- Baby's due date countdown
- Baby's weekly growth tracker
- Export a health report with charts for self-archive or doctors
- Insights from fertility specialists
- PIN code, Face ID, & Fingerprint lock to protect your private data
- Daily health tracker: weight, hydration, sleep, mood, sex, steps, etc.
- Breast self-exam guidance
- Multiple accounts to track for different, for example, mother/daughter 
- Unlimited app themes & pets
- Available in 39 languages
- Sync data with Apple Health
- Backup and restore data between devices
 
Note: Period Calendar should not be used to replace any form of contraceptive method.
 
Subscription Terms and Details
- Get unlimited access to all features for USD $49.99/year:
	• Cycle predictions for each month
	• Fertility analysis of each day
	• Unlock all self-care content
	• Kegel exercise for women
	• Unlimited app themes and pets
	• Remove ads forever
- The payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
- The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Subscription may be managed, and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to Account Settings after purchase.
- The account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.
 
If you have any questions or concerns while using our app, please feel free to contact us via feedback in our app ( [Settings] -> [Bug Report&Feedback]) or write to us at abishkking.apple@gmail. 
 
Privacy Policy: https://pc.abishkking.com/privacypolicy.html
Terms of Use: https://pc.abishkking.com/terms.html

Struggling with Sleep? Improve your rest with ShutEye®’s relaxing sounds and comprehensive sleep tracker app.

After a hectic day, does sleep feel elusive? ShutEye® is here to ensure you get the restful sleep you need.

Sleep is crucial for productivity, health, and happiness. In today’s busy world, it’s more elusive than ever. Stop tossing and turning. Start falling asleep naturally and healthily with ShutEye® app.

ShutEye® offers a complete sleep solution with:
- Extensive library of sleep sounds and ambient noise.
- Bedtime stories for a soothing transition to sleep.
- Smart alarm clock for a gentle wake-up experience.
- Scientific sleep tracker to understand your sleep cycles and track your snoring.
- Customizable sound mixes, including white noise app free.
- App to track snoring for nighttime insights.

It’s your all-in-one sleep app for better sleep.

Who Needs ShutEye®?
- Stressed workers
- Sleep-deprived parents
- Students under pressure
- Meditation fans
- Light sleepers
- Sleep quality improvers
- Snoring enthusiasts

Achieving a good night’s sleep is vital for your health and well-being. Let ShutEye® help you attain the deep, restorative sleep you deserve. Don’t settle for fatigue and lack of vitality. Use ShutEye® to find the peace you need. Sleep well and become the best, most vibrant version of yourself. Try ShutEye® today!

APPLE INTEGRATION: ShutEye® saves your sleep sessions to your Apple Health app.

Subscription Information:
- Auto-renewing subscription at $59.99/year for unlimited access to VIP features.
- Charged to your iTunes Account upon confirmation.
- Manage or cancel in Account Settings anytime.
- Auto-renews unless you cancel 24 hours before renewal.
- No refunds for leftover free trial time.

Contact Information:
Email: contact.sleep@enerjoy.life
Privacy Policy: https://enerjoy.life/privacy-policy
Term of service: https://enerjoy.life/terms-of-use
iOS App Support: www.enerjoy.life/contact-us/

Live in sync with your cycle using Flo, the world’s most popular female health app. Get personalised insights and predictions on your body.

Whether you want to predict your period, get pregnant, track your pregnancy, or better understand your symptoms, Flo is your all-in-one female health partner. Join over 420 million members.

With Flo, you can:
- Keep your data safe: Flo is the first period and ovulation tracker to achieve dual ISO 27001 and ISO 27701 Certifications (aka gold standards in data protection).
- Feel more understood: Share your Flo insights via Flo for Partners to feel more connected, understood, and supported.
- Get an extra layer of protection: Anonymous Mode means no one, not even Flo, can identify you based on your health data.
- Join a supportive community: Secret Chats is where members can discuss topics and connect with others on the same journey.
- Access reliable health information: Flo collaborates with a globally recognised organisation dedicated to reproductive health and rights, ensuring trustworthy support for your health journey.

With Flo Premium, you can enjoy:
- Monthly cycle reports
- Symptom predictions and patterns
- Tailored prediction insights
- Detailed pregnancy tracking
- Full access to Flo for Partners
- A 24/7 virtual Health Assistant
- All articles, videos, and courses reviewed by 140+ health experts

New! Flo supports perimenopause:
- Know what might be perimenopause and how to tune in to your body’s changes.
- Get clarity on common perimenopause symptoms and what can help.
- Make more informed health decisions and identify what you need to feel your best.

Start tracking your cycle for free today.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://flo.health/privacy-policy  
https://flo.health/terms-of-use 

Connect with Flo:
Web: flo.health
TikTok: @flotracker
Instagram: @flotracker

Please note: Flo is not a diagnostic tool and should not be used as a method of contraception or to facilitate conception. Predictions and insights provided by the app are intended for informational purposes only and are not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider for any health concerns or decisions.

Flo uses HealthKit to read menstrual cycle data and export your Flo activities to the Health app.

If you have any difficulties using the app, contact Flo via support@flo.health.

Notice of Access Permission:
Flo may request permission for:
- In-app notifications or reminders.
- Uploading photos to specific forum discussions.
- Uploading audio recordings to closed group chats.
Content sharing is entirely optional. Flo does not automatically access your content. You can select what you want to share.

My Calendar – Period Tracker by Simple Innovation is an elegant and easy-to-use period tracker that helps you take control of the many aspects of your menstrual cycle — from ovulation, fertility and periods, to birth control pills, moods and other symptoms.

Whether you are concerned about conceiving, birth control and contraception, or regularity of period cycles, Period Calendar can help. Our tracker is easy to use and offers everything you need: Track irregular periods, weight, temperature, moods, blood flow, symptoms and more.

Be PREPARED for your PERIOD:
- MAKE PLANS for rest and work
- Be CONFIDENT about your HEALTH. Add information to the app, use it to answer your doctor’s questions.
- Note SYMPTOMS, get insights. Use the charts to track changes.
- Track OVULATION and FERTILITY dates. 
- Keep your data SECRET. Use pin-code, face-ID or a fingerprint to keep the data safe.
- Take PILLS on time. Use reminders so you don't miss your pill time.

Discreet reminders keep you informed and prepared by predicting upcoming periods, ovulation, and fertile days. The app adapts to your cycle history and the calculator accurately predicts the important events during your cycle.

Key features:
- Vital info at a glance: intuitive calendar home page lets you visualize non-fertile, fertile, ovulation, expected period and actual period
- Entire cycle log and settings can be backed up and restored easily and quickly. Never be afraid to lose your calendar data, even when you lost your phone or get a new one.
- Detailed tracking: daily planner lets you save essential period information like flow, intercourse, symptoms, moods, temperature, weight, medicine, PMS, other cervical observations, and general diary notes
- Always stay in the loop with notifications for upcoming period, fertility windows or ovulation
- Protect your most private data from curious eyes: password lock it using a unique PIN code
- Personalize and make it yours: Gorgeous new watercolor themes, adjust period prediction intervals, luteal phase length, plus choose your units of measure and the first day of the week (Sunday or Monday) – all in Settings
- Abstinence mode hides ovulation, fertility and intercourse related data—perfect tracker for girls and teens just starting their periods
- Want to start fresh? Just reset it

You can track changes and symptoms during perimenopause, such as hot flashes, night sweats, mood swings, and irregular cycles.
Stay in control of your health with personalized insights and reminders tailored for this important life stage.
Whether you are starting to notice irregularities or want extra support, Perimenopause Mode helps you better understand your body and feel prepared every day.

This highly customizable period tracker and pregnancy planning calendar is perfect for any woman to take control of her health and keep organized.

Download it for FREE today!

By tightening the bracelet, we can help more people understand and manage their health, thereby making them healthier. At the same time, we will get closer to your footsteps and distance to provide you with better health guidance. You can view the detailed step record analysis at the end of the exercise, or refer to the exercise record on the homepage),

description:
AI-Powered Workouts That Deliver Real Results!We will customize a 21-day personalized fitness plan for you! Even if you're a complete beginner in fitness, you can easily master the knack and enjoy the fun of working out. With "MuscleMaxme", you can achieve a healthy and fit physique!
● Professionally Customized, Your Exclusive Personal Fitness Course
Everyone's physical condition and fitness expectations are different. "MuscleMaxme" has assembled a team of top fitness experts in the industry. Through advanced algorithms and detailed questionnaire assessments, we will create a unique customized plan for you. Whether you aim to build muscle, lose fat, or maintain your current body shape, we will precisely plan every step of your training journey to ensure that every drop of sweat you shed brings you closer to a better version of yourself.
● Flexible Workouts, Easy Shaping
Daily workouts only take 10 to 15 minutes, so you don't have to endure the boredom and pain of long-hour exercises.
● From Novice to Expert
Whether you're a fitness novice or an experienced professional, you can find suitable courses through our easy-to-understand guidance. Since everyone's fitness level varies, you should choose exercise methods that match your own ability and pace.
● Work out All Parts of the Body
The courses designed by our fitness experts are aimed at helping you achieve your goals. You can choose a full-body workout or focus on specific body parts, making your training more targeted.
"MuscleMaxme" – The ultimate fitness partner exclusively designed for men, taking you on a personalized fitness journey!
This is a video-based learning platform for fitness enthusiasts. With the help of high-definition video tutorials, professional coaches will demonstrate every movement and explain the key points and details in depth. Even if you're at home, you can enjoy professional gym-level guidance. With daily updated training programs, your fitness journey will always be full of novelty and challenges.
"MuscleMaxme" Automatic Renewal Service Instructions
【"MuscleMaxme"】Enjoy multiple privileges, such as intelligent customized plans, professional assessments, and unlimited access to courses.
【Subscription Cycle】
Continuous Monthly Subscription: The subscription cycle is 1 month.
Continuous Six-Month Subscription: The subscription cycle is 6 months.
Continuous Annual Subscription: The subscription cycle is 12 months.
【Subscription Fees】
Subject to the information of in-App Purchase (iAP). For example, the continuous monthly subscription product costs 48 yuan per month, and the continuous annual subscription product costs 188 yuan per year.
【Payment】
After the user confirms the purchase and makes the payment, the amount will be deducted from the iTunes account.
【Auto-renewal】
The "Continuous Monthly / Annual" products support auto-renewal. After the purchase is confirmed, the fee will be deducted from your iTunes account. Unless you cancel the auto-renewal at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription, the subscription will be automatically renewed. Apple will automatically deduct the fee from the iTunes account within 24 hours before the subscription expires. Upon successful payment, the membership validity period will be extended by one cycle.
【Canceling Auto-renewal】
On your Apple iOS device, open the "App Store" --> Click on the Apple account avatar in the upper right corner --> Enter the "Account" section --> Click on "Subscriptions" --> Select "MuscleMaxme" and cancel the subscription.

** Featured by Apple ** Join +9 million users!
Hevy is the most intuitive workout tracker & planner in the world. No ads and free. Plan your weight lifting routines, log your workouts and track your exercise progress. Join a growing community and get started today - for free!

WHAT USERS ARE SAYING
•  "Seriously the best workout tracker I've ever used. Simple. Free. Tons of graphs. Amazing quality videos" - Sam Ilelaboye
•  "Seeing what my friends and other athletes are working out at the gym has totally changed my experience. Now I can copy my friend's workouts and compare myself. It's super motivating" - Jaume
•  "Tracking my workouts with Hevy has taken my training to the next level, I'm getting stronger every week. Being able to plan my routines really helps me being efficient at the gym." - Carlos D.

FEATURES
•  Track your lifts with an intuitive, simple to use interface.
•  Use the calendar to stay on top of your training schedule
•  Hundreds of exercises with free high-quality videos for you to focus on your form
•  Follow your friend's progress by following their lifts and copying their routines
•  Create your own custom exercises for your workouts
•  Set up your profile as a private profile or a public one
•  Mark sets as Warmup, Normal, Drop sets, Failure and Supersets
•  Customize automatic rest timers for each exercise
•  Analyze your workout sessions in detail with muscle group graphs

•  Copy your friends' workouts
•  Dark Mode
•  Hevy uses HealthKit and CareKit to export your Hevy workouts into the Health app, this feature can be turned on in the settings.

APPLE WATCH
•  Sync your Hevy routines to your Apple Watch

L'appli carte Vitale est votre carte Vitale sur smartphone : un service numérique de l’assurance maladie téléchargeable gratuitement.

Elle ne remplace pas votre carte Vitale mais constitue une alternative.

POUR ACTIVER VOTRE APPLI CARTE VITALE, VOUS DEVEZ VERIFIER LES CONDITIONS SUIVANTES :
- Avoir 16 ou 18 ans suivant votre régime d’affiliation,
- Disposer d’une pièce d’identité autorisée, 
- Disposer d’un smartphone compatible.

Retrouvez toutes les conditions pour pouvoir bénéficier de l’appli carte Vitale sur www.applicartevitale.fr

UNE FOIS ACTIVEE, VOTRE APPLI CARTE VITALE PERMET : 
- de s’identifier, comme avec sa carte Vitale chez votre pharmacien, votre médecin, votre chirurgien-dentiste, votre infirmier, votre opticien…,
- de visualiser vos dépenses de soins réalisées avec votre appli carte Vitale,
- d'accéder à vos informations et à celles de vos bénéficiaires : numéro de Sécurité sociale, organisme obligatoire de rattachement, mais aussi d’autres informations telles que l’Identité Nationale de Santé.

L’équipement des professionnels de santé se fait progressivement.
Il est donc conseillé de toujours garder sa carte Vitale sur soi.

Pour connaître les professionnels de santé qui acceptent l’application, vous pouvez consulter l’annuaire santé disponible sur le site Ameli https://annuairesante.ameli.fr
Un affichage est présent chez les professionnels de santé équipés. N'hésitez pas à leur présenter votre appli carte Vitale. 

SECURITE ET RESPECT DE VOS DONNEES
- L’appli carte Vitale est développée de manière à garantir l’intégrité, la disponibilité et la confidentialité des données. Les traitements respectent le RGPD.
- Les données d’identification sont stockées uniquement dans le smartphone. Il est possible de les effacer à tout moment.
- L’appli carte Vitale est accessible avec une double sécurisation : un mot de passe de déverrouillage de votre appli carte Vitale qui vient s’ajouter au mot de passe de déverrouillage du smartphone.

L’application carte Vitale est développée par le GIE SESAM Vitale, qui est missionné par l’assurance maladie à la demande du ministère des Solidarités et de la Santé.
Plus d’infos sur www.applicartevitale.fr

Gym Day is a gym workout planner and tracker that makes it easy for you to log and track your weight lifting workouts. Create your own gym workout plans and routines by selecting from an extensive list of exercises such as bench press, barbell squat, deadlift, and a variety of dumbbell, barbell and olympic exercises. The workout tracker also contains built in gym workout plans that you can easily get started on. Some workout schedules included are Stronglifts, 5x5, Madcow, Push Pull Legs (PPL), Starting Strength and much more. Training with weights has never been easier.

When you create your gym workout plans and log your weight lifting workouts, the workout planner will help you visualize your progress. You can view one rep max charts of the major compound exercises like bench press, barbell squat, and deadlift. 

It has been proven that by tracking your weight lifting workouts you will be able to increase your bench press, barbell squat, and deadlift significantly.

Here is why many people doing weight lifting and powerlifting use Gym Day:

Start logging a workout immediately
- Add exercises as you go and log the reps and weights
- Easy to use exercise tracker that’s quicker than using pen and paper and spreadsheet
- Add supersets, trisets, and giant sets to your gym workout
- Add notes to your sets and workouts
- Plate calculator

Built in workout schedules
- Beginner workout schedules like StrongLifts 5x5 and Ice Cream Fitness
- Advanced workout schedules like Madcow 5x5, PHUL, and PHAT
- Workout schedules that allow you to build muscle, burn fat, and build strength
- Everything from powerlifting, bodybuilding, weight training, and strength training workout schedules
- A gym trainer that is catered to your fitness goals

Build your own workout schedule
- Library of 300+ gym exercises with images and instructions included to add to your workout schedule 
- Workout gym exercises such as barbell squats, bench press, barbell rows, and deadlifts
- Customize sets and reps for each exercise in your workout schedule
- Add individual rest times for each exercise in your workout
- Group exercises into supersets, trisets, and giant sets
- Allows you to create workout schedules like 5x5, 3x5, 1x3, Starting Strength, German Volume Training, and Crossfit workouts
- Perfect for people doing powerlifting and bodybuilding who want to take their strength training and weight training to the next level

During a workout session
- The workout app will allow you to easily log the reps and weights of each set
- A rest timer appears making sure you are taking an appropriate amount of rest
- You will be able to see the last performance of the set you are doing 
- Focus on beating your personal records and making those bodybuilding, strength training, and weight training gains
- Your personal gym guide and personal trainer giving you instructions on how to perform the exercises

Workout timer
- After completing each set the exercise tracker will show a rest timer
- Workout timer notification pops up when you navigate away from the workout app

Track your progression
- Track how much time spent in the gym and which muscle groups are targeted
- Detailed workout charts and workout graphs
- Track your one rep max for powerlifting, strength training, and weight training

Workout history
- A list of all your gym logs in one organized place
- Allows you to perform a workout session again and fills in your workout log automatically

Connect to Apple Health
- Share all your workout sessions and body measurements logged to Apple Health

No equipment needed. Home Pilates workouts for beginners!
Tailor a 28-day Pilates fitness program for you! You can easily learn it and enjoy the fun of Pilates while maintaining a healthy body posture! Quickly forget about the crowded gyms and bid farewell to boring workouts. Through the Pilates program training, you can build a healthy and good figure!Let yourself move along with the rhythm! Shape your body, build up your strength and exercise your muscles. Always pay attention to your daily workouts

● Personalized Pilates Workout PlansSet small fitness goals for 28 days, let your body follow the rhythm and feel the changes in your body.
● Freely Practice for Easy Body ShapingYour daily workout only takes 10 to 15 minutes, so you don't need to feel bored or find it hard to persevere because of spending hours on exercise.
● Multiple Types to Choose FromPopular types such as wall Pilates, mat Pilates, lazy yoga are available for you to choose.
● From Novice to ProfessionalWhether you're a beginner or a professional, you can find suitable courses through our easy-to-use instructions. Remember that everyone is at a different level, so give priority to choosing the ones that suit your physical strength and rhythm for practice.
● Applicable to All Body PartsCourses designed by fitness and Pilates experts can help you achieve your goals. You can choose the whole body or specific parts like abdominal muscles, back or legs to make your practice more targeted.

A video learning platform specially created for Pilates enthusiasts, with a vast number of Pilates videos shared and all kinds of professional Pilates tutorials. It's a boon for self-taught Pilates and fitness lovers. With step-by-step teaching, it's especially suitable for beginners, making Pilates simpler and more interesting! You don't need to worry about not being able to learn it anymore!

PilatesFit - Energetic Pilates workouts and aerobic exercises to make your body posture and figure more relaxed and pleasant!

Your Skin. Finally Understood.

Skin Bliss is the world’s smartest skincare app—powered by science, built for real results.

From AI face scanning to routine planning, ingredient safety checks to daily tracking, Skin Bliss is your complete skincare operating system.

Whether you’re just starting out or you’ve tried everything—Skin Bliss helps you finally understand what your skin truly needs, build the right routine, and track visible progress over time.

Powered by AI. Backed by science. Loved by skincare geeks.
We combine cutting-edge AI, ingredient research, and dermatological expertise to help you:
• Discover your true skin profile
• Build a routine that fits your goals, lifestyle, and concerns
• Avoid product clashes, overuse, or missing steps
• Track your visible progress with photos, mood logs, and our AI analyzer

WHAT YOU CAN DO WITH SKIN BLISS

Face Scanner – Your Skin Profile in Seconds
Scan your face to detect visible concerns and build a personalized profile: skin type, concerns, and what your routine should actually do.

Routine Builder & Templates
Build from scratch or start with expert-designed routines. Schedule products with ingredient-smart logic, daily or on rotation.

Routine Evaluator + Timeline

【VitalTide APP: Your Portable Health Data Manager, Making Health Management Easier】
In the fast-paced modern life, health management is often "squeezed out" by busyness—you can’t find paper and pen when you want to record your blood pressure, lack systematic data when you want to analyze blood glucose changes, and have no way to integrate multiple health indicators. To help you break through these troubles, VitalTide APP comes into being. It integrates the recording of multi-dimensional health indicators such as blood pressure, blood glucose and heart rate, and serves as your reliable health partner that you can rely on at any time with simple operations and clear data presentation.
Core Features: Comprehensive Coverage to Make Health Data "Traceable"
1. Accurate Recording: Every Measurement Has a Clear Record
● Blood Pressure Recording: Adapted to Daily Monitoring Scenarios  
Whether it is the basic blood pressure measurement after getting up in the morning, or irregular monitoring during work breaks, after exercise, etc., the APP has a convenient recording entrance. You can quickly save the data by manually entering the measured values, no complicated operations are required, and it is easy to track the fluctuation trend of blood pressure.
● Blood Glucose Recording: Distinguish Scenarios to Facilitate Diet Analysis  
For blood glucose management needs, an intuitive and easy-to-use dedicated interface is designed: it supports distinguishing between "pre-meal" and "post-meal" records to help you clearly sort out the correlation between diet and blood glucose changes.
2. Multi-Dimensional Coverage: Meet the Needs of Comprehensive Health Management
In addition to blood pressure and blood glucose, the APP also supports the recording of basic indicators such as heart rate, height and weight, and is also equipped with reference for healthy diet guidelines—from basic physiological data to daily diet suggestions, it covers your health management needs in one stop, eliminating the need to switch between multiple tools.
Disclaimer
VitalTide APP is only used as a tool for recording and organizing health data. It cannot replace medical equipment nor provide medical diagnosis or treatment advice. If you have any health discomfort, need to obtain professional medical opinions or make medical decisions, please be sure to consult a practicing doctor to ensure your health and safety.

Take control of your health
Your personal health companion - whether you are just starting your health journey or just keeping an eye on your indicators, it can help you.

Key Features
- Clear and easy-to-read health trends
Track your blood pressure with clear and easy-to-understand charts.

- Blood pressure record
Quickly record your blood pressure, discover long-term patterns, and manage your health with confidence.

- Daily articles
Explore lifestyle content tailored for blood pressure and healthy daily habits.

Start recording now to start your health journey.

Disclaimer
This app is intended as an auxiliary tool for personal health management. All health data and analysis results provided by this app are for reference only and cannot replace professional medical diagnosis or treatment. If you have any health questions, please consult a healthcare professional.

The official app for Amazfit, the Zepp app is free to use and trusted by top athletes such as running back Derrick Henry and sprinter Gabby Thomas. 

Built for sports and performance, it’s where you’ll track your training, health and recovery data, log your nutrition, and get easy-to-understand scores with AI-powered coaching and guidance — all protected with the highest level of data security.

TRACK MACROS: Snap a photo of your meal and instantly get calories, weight, and macronutrients. No watch required, just the Zepp App. Perfect for athletes balancing training with strict diets. Log as many meals as you want with no limits, or enter them manually if that’s easier.

HEALTH & FITNESS DATA: Vital health metrics like heart rate, sleep, stress, and blood oxygen, the Zepp App tracks your fitness progress in detail. It captures daily activity such as steps and calories burned, and advanced training data like pace, distance, speed, strength logs, and recovery insights.

SLEEP MONITORING:  The Zepp App monitors sleep with precision sensors and syncs the data to the Zepp App for full recovery analysis. You'll find detailed metrics on stages, duration, breathing, and recovery quality so you know if your body is ready to train hard or needs more rest to perform at its best.

HEART HEALTH: See all your essential heart health data in one place. Track heart rate, HRV, and resting heart rate (RHR), and manually add blood pressure and blood glucose from external devices for a complete view of the most important muscle in your body.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR WATCH: The Zepp App is where you’ll find software updates for your Amazfit smartwatch, band, or ring. It also gives you access to the Zepp Store, with hundreds of downloadable mini apps and watch faces to choose from.

DATA SECURITY: The Zepp App delivers the highest level of data security, keeping your information safe and private. Safeguarded by Amazon Web Services (AWS), all data is regionally stored, encrypted, fully GDPR compliant, and never sold.

FREE TO USE: The core experience of the Zepp App is free. You won't need to pay to view data tracked by your Amazfit device, upgrade software, or import maps. You'll also get free access to a core version of Zepp Aura, your very own wellness coach. For personalized wellness advice powered by AI, Zepp Aura Premium Subscription is available for a monthly or yearly fee, but there's no obligation to sign up. 

ZEPP AURA PREMIUM: Unlocking unlimited access to Zepp Aura will provide in-depth health assessments, a personal wellness assistant, sleep music and more (region specific).
- Available in: Most countries and regions
- Subscription Plans: Monthly or yearly options
- Subscriptions are confirmed via your Google account and renew automatically unless canceled at least 24 hours in advance. Any unused portion of a free trial is forfeited once a purchase is made.
- Details: https://upload-cdn.zepp.com/tposts/5845154

PERMISSIONS: The following optional permissions can enhance your experience but are not required:
- Location Access: Used for automatically tracking running or cycling routes, and to show local weather
- Storage: Used to import or export workout data, as well as save workout photos
- Phone, Contacts, SMS, Call Logs: Used to display calls/notifications/texts on your watch and enable call reminders
- Physical Activity: Used to synchronize step counts and workout information
- Camera: Used for taking pictures and scanning QR codes to pair your devices
- Calendar: Sync and manage schedules
- Nearby Devices: Used to discover and connect to smart devices through bluetooth

DISCLAIMER: Zepp is not a medical device and is intended for general fitness and health management purposes only

Auto-renewing subscription with 7 day free trial is available (requirement & price varies by territory). Payments will be charged to your iTunes Account after confirmation. Subscription automatically renewed unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed in your iTunes Account’s Settings after purchasing.

NOTE: WaterMinder is not a medical app. Suggested water intake goal is just an estimate based on your weight. Please consult your health provider if you want to use it for medical purposes or to obtain specific hydration needs.
